page.title: 18The Primary School
page.content: This school has 220 children in eight classes. Our class have been doing this work for the Domesday Project. These are our names: Steven Buchanan, Clara Carvey, Tami Connor, Katie Eaton, Malcolm Frisby, Paul Haines, Adrian Hanson, Dominic Harris, Kirsty Harris, Rebecca Hayes, Darren Honey, Daniel Hubbert, Ben James Hannah la Costa , Emily Macmillan, Christopher McNamee, David Meredith, Kristy Minion, Andrew Mobbs, Theo Osgerby, Amie Parkman Michael Pope, Thomas Reeves, Rebecca Smith, Victoria stevens, Clair Taylor, Rachel Ward, Lisa Wright, and Alison Yendole. We are third and fourth years aged 10 and 11. Our classroom is in a "terrapin" building. There are seven classes in the main school and two practical areas. We have a hall which is used for Assembly, P.E.,and dinners. We have 2 playgrounds,a pond, a garden
